item.title: nodejs-model is born
item.description: I’ve been struggling lately to find an appropriate way to handle models correctly, In one hand, these noSQL DBs such CouchDB have great flexibility and I didn’t want to ruin that with a blowing up ORM framework, in the other hand once the application grows a little bit more than a contact list app, then things become messy.
